mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, user_mobile, user_password, user_gender, user_state, add_time, user_pay_pwd, wechat_openid, alipay_account, available_predeposit, freeze_predeposit, user_coin, sign_limit, coin_total, user_qq, user_email, user_wx, alipay_name, delete_flg
mapper.select:
SELECT g_user.user_id, g_user.user_name, g_user.user_mobile, g_user.user_state, g_user.add_time, g_user.available_predeposit, g_user.freeze_predeposit, g_user.user_coin, g_user.coin_total FROM g_user WHERE delete_flg = 0
AND user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{page.search1},'%')
AND user_mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{page.search2},'%')
AND user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{page.search3},'%')

SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_mobile, u.user_state, u.add_time, u.available_predeposit, u.freeze_predeposit, u.user_coin, u.coin_total, s.s_num FROM g_user u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, count(sl_id) AS s_num FROM g_share_log WHERE is_pass = 1 GROUP BY (user_id) ) AS s ON s.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.delete_flg = 0
AND u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{page.search1},'%')
AND u.user_mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{page.search2},'%')
AND u.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{page.search3},'%')
ORDER BY s_num DESC
